title: International Velvet
brief_description: The sequel to “National Velvet.” This is the moving story of Sarah (Tatum O’Neal) and her intense determination to win the Equestrian Three Day Event Gold Medal at the Olympic Games. Co-starring Christopher Plummer, Anthony Hopkins and Nanette Newman.
